oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-06-06 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 6, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer Hank Locklin, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1026th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Hank Locklin; Stringbean; Cowboy Copas; Randy Hughes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces Chet Atkins -- El Cumbanchero (Chet Atkins) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Cowboy Copas introduces Hank Locklin -- Foreign Car (Hank Locklin) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Stringbean -- Take Me Back To Tulsa (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner and Cowboy Copas announce his tour schedule -- A World That's Real (Cowboy Copas, Randy Hughes) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Hughes, Randy, 1928-1963; Copas, Cowboy; Locklin, Hank
